title: Border, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, late Valencienne ground, with Brussels motifs
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Border resembling Valenciennes type, but made in Belgium. Design of floral, leaf and scroll forms. Réseau: twisted square shape; modes: fond de neige, portes. Valencienne ground hooked into Brussels motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, late Valencienne ground, with Brussels motifs. Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes. 1951-60-25.
